body.name: EnHomee Dresser, White Dresser, Wood Dressers & Chests of Drawers, White Dresser for Bedroom, Bedroom Dresser with Drawers, 6 Drawer Dresser with LED, Dresser Wood, Large Dressers Bedroom Furniture
features: 【Spacious 6 Drawer Dresser】This white dresser has plenty of storage space. The size of EnHomee's dresser for bedroom (47.2"W x 15.7"D x 39.4"H) is equipped with 6 large drawers to provide sufficient storage space for your clothes, blankets, underwear, and protect your privacy. The wood table top is designed for simple storage, placing glasses, alarm clocks, table lamps, magazines, books, and even skin care products. Make your house more organized

【Wood Dresser with16 RGB Colors LED Light】The beautiful LED light will make your home looks more modern , fashionable and adds a soft and warm atmosphere. Make the bedroom dressers more unique and attractive. The bedroom dresser for closet is equipped with LED lights strip with 16 color modes and you can control its color with button. You can choose the color you like according to your needs and scenes

【Bedroom Dressers with Elegent Modern Design】With the perfect combination of the pure color board and gold handle, the dresser is the optimal choice for home lovers to decorate homes. This Storage dresser with its versatile style is not only suitable for bedroom, closet, living room but also in the office, entryway and dining room. This is the ideal piece of furniture to reduce clutter and create neat, beautiful and comfortable living conditions for your home

【Chests of Drawers for Sturdy & Safty】The dresser is made of high-quality particle board, with high quality metal slide rails to ensure that they stay smooth and noiseless during your daily use. The white finish is glossy and looks attractive ,the waterproof surface is convenient for cleaning and maintenance. Besides, in order to create a safe environment for your family, this dressers is equipped with anti-tipping device so that you no longer have to worry about the safety of your family

【Easy Assembly & Great Customer Service】This chest of drawers can be used as dressers for bedroom and also be used as a TV stand for living room. More use scenarios waiting for you to explore. Our long dresser comes with a clear instruction and installation vedio, you can easily and quickly put it together. If you have any question about thie item,please feel free to contact us,our professional service team will provide you with a pleasing solution within 24 hours

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: It looks more beautiful when the light is in the dark

Will it shake once it's installed? Is the shelf sturdy enough? After more than 10 tests, once assembled according to the installation, it will not shake. And this dresser with 5 metal support feet is stable enough and load-bearing, with strong support ability and prevent scratches to your floor. What is the maximum load-bearing capacity? Can i put a TV on it? The load bearing capacity of the table top is 200 lbs. This chest of drawers can be used as a TV stand, is ideal for TV up to 53".
Make your house more organized The 6 same large drawers provide enough space to organize different clothes, accessories or bits and pieces.
White Long Dressers with LED Lights This is the ideal piece of furniture to reduce clutter and create neat, beautiful and comfortable living conditions for your home
Suitable for Different Sizes of TV

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dresser with lights!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my teenage daughter.. easy to assemble.. takes about 2-3 hours for 2 adults.. The box is very heavy. Pieces are labeled which obviously makes assembly easier. Once assembled.. it’s a great dresser. Drawers are smooth in operation and deep for clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars ALMOST a 5/5 - Pieces came cracked!
reviews.reviewText: Overall, the dresser is exactly what we wanted to for our baby’s nursery. My husband chose this one because of the cool LED lights. I would’ve given this a 5 star review, except several pieces arrived cracked. For what this is priced at, I wouldn’t have expected any of these items to look the way they did. Some of the cardboard boxing was also busted open and several pieces were all over the place. I understand these things may happen during packing and transit, but for the price, I’d expect bubble wrapping or something to pad and protect the items inside.Once pieced together, however, the dresser looks great. Sturdy. My husband and I were able to put this together in about 30-45 minutes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OK, I really like this dresser, NOW -
reviews.reviewText: - with that said you have to assemble it like REAL furniture in order for anything like this to last. I am a builder, and whenever I buy things like this I assemble it with WOOD GLUE in the dowel areas and on long seems. This thing is SOLID, as are all the items I've assembled. Even IKEA (my wife likes IKEA) garbage and they too stand up to regular usage without falling apart. Everyone of my pieces is solid. USE HAND TOOLS NOT POWER TOOLS! These are made of particle board/wood so they are very easily damaged by power tools. Love the style, love the lights, and the remote, gives the room that little extra something when it's time to get on the job ;-) LOVE IT! and so does she...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great, easy to assemble. Nice actual drawer slides
reviews.reviewText: This dresser looks great and was easy to assemble and it quite sturdy. It has actual roller drawer slides unlike some other inexpensive dressers I got where the drawers just slide on felt pads. This is better. Very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very heavy with weak legs---see picture
reviews.reviewText: Looks beautiful, but the legs are not strong enough to support the weight of the piece. This happened within 12 hours of assembling it. Can't return it, and will be difficult to replace, considering the weight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The handles of drawer have very sharp edges. They need to be deburred. Be careful during assembly. it cuts your hand like a knife.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it! It’s worth it!
reviews.reviewText: Super sturdyVery prettyEasy to assembleLove it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Slightly difficult to put together. Not super sturdy but pretty good quality for the money. The light feature is awesome! We do love this dresser.
